fullName.jp: レナ・シャルロット・タイクーン

description.jp:
タイクーン王国の心優しき王女。隕石の
落下で気絶していたところをバッツらに
助けられ 共にクリスタルを守る旅に
出ることに。行方不明の姉との再会など
様々な出会いと別れに翻弄されながらも
国や民 そして世界を救うという
信念の元 奮闘した。
description.gl: The kind-hearted princess of Tycoon. Bartz rescues Lenna、 who had lost consciousness from a meteorite impact、 and together they journey to protect the crystals. Finding her long-lost sister、 and experiencing many other meetings and partings、 through thick and thin、 her conviction to her kingdom、 her subjects、 and to saving the world drives her on.

jp.text: こっちを見ちゃだめよ！
やっぱり姉さんだったのね！
怖がっているのね……大丈夫よ こっちにおいで！
私たちがいるじゃない！
涙なんか 似合わないわよ？

gl.text: I knew it! You really ARE my sister!
Oh、 you must have been so scared... It's okay now、 don't worry. Come closer!

desc.en:
Raises party BRV based on Initial BRV
2-HIT AoE ranged BRV + HP attack
Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
HP damage dealt is split equally amongst all enemies
Grants [Princess of Tycoon] for 6 turns

[Princess of Tycoon] has the following effects:
• Raises party Initial BRV
• Grants party [BRV Regen]
desc.gl:
Grants party BRV based on own INT BRV
2-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 6 turns Princess of Tycoon
desc.jp:
味方全員に自身の初期BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算し
2HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に6ACTION「プリンセスオブタイクーン」付与

name.jp: みだれうちエクステンド

desc.en:
Reduces the mastery requirement for 「Rapid Fire」 by 1 use

When using 「Rapid Fire」, 「Rapid Fire+」:
- Tremendously raises BRV potency
- Triggers an HP attack on target after use

When using 「Rapid Fire」:
- Inflicts 「Initial BRV Down」 for 2 turns based on the number of BRV hits landed
- Grants 「Small Max BRV Up」 and 「Small Attack Up」 for 6 turns

When using 「Rapid Fire+」:
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Minimally improves 「Initial BRV Down」 effect per BRV hit
- Slightly improves 「Max BRV Up」 and extends its duration by 4 turns
- Grants 「Medium Attack Up」 for 8 turns
desc.gl:
Mastery requirement for Rapid Fire to become Rapid Fire+ reduced by 1

When using Rapid Fire, Rapid Fire+:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target
 
When using Rapid Fire: 
 • Target: 2 turns INT BRV Down based on BRV attack hit count
 • Self: 6 turns MAX BRV Up I, ATK Up I
 
When using Rapid Fire+:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Marginal INT BRV Down boost based on number of BRV attack hits
 • Slight MAX BRV boost, duration +4
 • Self: 8 turns ATK Up II
